ygData.subject: Re: Lets move on... we have done all we can :) SPOILER !
ygData.msgSnippet: SPOILER DOWN One thing is sure in beta 4 as i remember al exp in dungeon is 25% more then out of dangun as for higer risk and if you also get a full group of 6
ygData.messageBody:
SPOILER DOWN





























One thing is sure in beta 4 as i remember al exp in dungeon is 25% more
then out of dangun as for higer risk
and if you also get a full group of 6 members it is 20 % more TO TOTAL so i
suggest to go in dungeon it is worth a try i suggest a PAW or BB or if not
go to hunt scarecows in karanas on farm.



At 11.42 03/06/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "Jay Hollums" <jhollums@...>
>
>I would like to know if anyone has any good suggestions for a group of 11-14
>consisting of a cleric, wizard, enchanter, and mage in the Qeynos area... we
>prefer the non dungeon settings for now so out side areas are the prefered
>spot :)
>
>Rutree II
>Cazic-Thul
